alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:12AM PST until January 19 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From noon today to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Traveling along Highway 204 and Interstate 84 may be difficult at times with snow-covered surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
